activities: Click Commerce (“Click”) receives human resources personal information from its European subsidiaries in the UK and processes this information at its world headquarters located in Chicago, Illinois, USA in order to carry out the business’s human resources functions, such as personnel management, promotion, salary setting, and tax work.
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Human Resources, Manually Processed
privacyprograms: Click has two privacy policies. One policy specifically addresses European Client Data and is available upon request to all European clients of Click and the Subsidiaries whose information is processed by Click. The second policy addresses Human Resources Information and is available to the company’s employees in the United States and Europe.
recoursemech: Click provides an In-house Resolution process whereby European Client complaints will be reviewed by a Privacy Committee Chairperson and then escalated to the General Counsel if necessary. Employee complaints will be reviewed by a Director of Human Resources then escalated to the General Counsel if necessary. Furthermore, Click agrees to fully cooperate with data protection authorities in the European Union as well as in the United States (including, without limitation, the Federal Trade Commission) and the State of Illinois.
